name: Fluff-Fleece Goat
description: These gentle beasts can be found all over Teyvat and were among the earliest livestock tamed by humans.\nAfter arriving in The Realm Within, they quickly adapted to the environment and expanded their usual range from flat ground to every corner of the teapot realm. Fortunately, the canines within instinctively shouldered the responsibility of protecting the Fluff-Fleece Goats. Obviously, this is excellent news for Tubby, who is in charge of managing the place...
